about_the_game:
ARMED DECOBOT is a unique blend of Beat 'Em Up and Bullet Hell Shoot 'Em Up mechanics inspired by Treasure and Metal Slug. It seamlessly combines the crowd control & throw heavy melee combat of Beat 'Em Ups with the intense dodge & shoot gameplay of Shmups. It's fast paced, it's difficult, it's chaotic, it's a pure unbound arcade action game! A quick burst of adrenaline to start the day!

Gameplay


  • You will seamlessly switch between ranged & melee combat as the situation demands.
  • You'll strategically pepper enemies with shots to keep them stunned as you move in for a combo!
  • You'll knock them down, pick them up with your grappling hook and throw them at other enemies!
  • You will create devastating throw chains!
  • You will use everything in your arsenal to frantically fight over screen space!
  • You will sweat bullets while trying to keep the aggressive, nasty enemies under control!


It's a game with maxed out risk and reward!






  • Pick up and play, immediate arcadey gameplay with simple controls and constant action. Each run is a short burst of fun.
  • 7 densely packed, tight stages, each one with multiple boss fights.
  • Dynamic, crowd control centered gameplay.
  • Robust grab & throw game.
  • Seamless combination of ranged & melee combat.
  • Very aggressive & mean enemies.
  • Dynamic difficulty - enemies become more dangerous if you play better.
  • A healthy selection of difficulty modes - from tough but fair to complete madness.
  • A fleshed out scoring system that's not just for show! The better you score, the more toys you will have to play with.
  • 3 playable characters, each one provides a radically different set of mechanics & balance. You will have to re-learn the game for each one!
  • Convenient practice tools.
  • Online leaderboards.

short_description: Your work van has been stolen! Use your armed & modified Cleaning Unit to fight your way through a fractured and corrupt floating city that hovers over a war zone. Find and recover your van before your business goes under! Armed Decobot is unique mixture of Arcade Beat 'Em Up and Bullet Hell design.
